description:

Gold drop rate increased by 200%.

description:
Create a custom Celestial item. Celestial items come with a bonus 90 Vitality on them and roll near perfect stats. You can choose the set it belongs to, the slot, and three of the stats it will roll. You can also create unique weapons or items with it.
A celestial item can be used only by the hero creating it.
name: Custom Celestial Item
subtitle: Item
